properties.name: spring.cloud.bus.env.enabled
properties.description: Flag to switch off environment change events (default on).

properties.name: spring.cloud.bus.refresh.enabled
properties.description: Flag to switch off refresh events (default on).

properties.name: spring.cloud.bus.shutdown.enabled
properties.description: Flag to switch off shutdown events (default on).

properties.name: spring.cloud.bus.trace.enabled
properties.description: Flag to switch on tracing of acks (default off).
